description:
Chiyo introduces Nozaki to her friend Seo Yuzuki since he wanted a model for a new character in "Let`s Fall in Love." She also asks Mikoshiba if he happens to know anyone that would be a good fit. Mikoshiba then introduces Chiyo to the Prince of the School.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: バイオレンスVSプリンス
